title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers (via proxy).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend with LangChain abstractions.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama: generate, chat, pull, list, delete models with native streaming.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline code completion and chat copilot.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: FastAPI chatbot, Next.js app, RAG with Chroma, function-calling examples.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks including CPU, NVIDIA, and OpenShift variants plus WebUI.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module that injects an Ollama service with async configuration and streaming support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama with tokio-based async client and strong typing.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama: generate, chat, pull, push, and stream with idiomatic Go APIs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with Ollama models in threads with custom system prompts.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Minimal RAG chatbot using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex to chat over local documents.
